controller - package controller

ControllerFacade - Class in controller
The Class ControllerFacade It provides a facade of the Controller component.
ControllerFacade(IView, IModel) - Constructor for class controller.ControllerFacade
This method get the view, the model and the collisionManager
crossCollision(IPawn, IPawn) - Method in class controller.CollisionManager
This method is used in order to know every case of collision with every entity (Monster, Spell, Player) Here we're comparing the position of an entity 1 with an entity 2
